column1: The founder of my house was Godric Gryffindor
Gryffindor values courage bravery nerve and chivalry
The founder of my house was Helga Hufflepuff
Hufflepuffs value hard work patience justice and loyalty
The founder of my house was Rowena Ravenclaw
Ravenclaw values intelligence creativity learning and wit
Good at riddles and solving problems
You-Know-Who / Voldelmort was in this house
The founder of my house was Salazar Slytherin
Slytherin house values ambition and cunning
